subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Track and Field
Walking
Cycling, Mountain Bike
Volleyball
lead_paragraph: Sergey Kirdyapkin delivered the country’s first gold in the event in 20 years; Julie Bresset of France won the mountain bike gold medal at her first Olympics; Japan won the bronze medal in women’s volleyball.
snippet: Sergey Kirdyapkin delivered the country’s first gold in the event in 20 years; Julie Bresset of France won the mountain bike gold medal at her first Olympics; Japan won the bronze medal in women’s volleyball.
